name: Premium Pork International
goal:
Premium Porc Group is a Danish holding with vertically integrated activities in agribusiness, covering cereal, feed and pig production.
Main area of expertise: development and management of large scale pig production units, using Danish expertise, technology and genetics, while applying a tested and improved business model.
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Trade
euInitiatives: Legislation that regulates the professional pig production industry, meat production industry, trading of live animals and meat products, disease control and management.
